CV_DESCRIPTION: I graduated from the National Defense University in July 2021. Contrary to my profession and academic career, I have been interested in computer and web technologies since my middle school age in many branches (Seo, Front-end Web Development, Wordpress CMS...) I improved myself by experimenting, online trainings and bootcamp processes. I have been pursuing this interest as a hobby and freelance work and I am currently integrating it into my business life as a Front-End Developer at ID3 company. At the same time, I continue to work as a Web Manager at Bublogta Digital Content Platform, which I am the founder of.
